title: 3 Questions to Consider Before Investing on Your Own
subtitle: Understand key considerations for making independent investment decisions and how market conditions affect your strategies.
content:
3 Questions to Consider Before Investing on Your Own

Here are the three questions you need to consider before investing on your own. I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager, and now I create financial content for free to help you navigate your investing journey.

1. Are We Entering a Recession?

It doesn’t matter.

2. Is the Market Going to Crash?

Absolutely it will.

3. Is Now a Good Time to Invest?

Always.

If any of this information is helpful, please like and follow, and I'll keep trying to get you one step closer to where you need to be.
